Method Detail

queryResultsAsList

public static <P> List<P> queryResultsAsList(EntitiesQuery<P> query)
                                  throws DataAccessException
Fetches all results of an EntitiesQuery query to a list.

Type Parameters:
P - Type of entities returned by the query.
Parameters:
query - Query who's results are put in the list.
Returns:
Returns a list that contains all objects fetched by the query.
Throws:
DataAccessException

queryResultsAsConvertedList

public static <A,B extends A> List<B> queryResultsAsConvertedList(EntitiesQuery<A> query)
                                                     throws DataAccessException
Fetches all results of an EntitiesQuery query as a list of a specific sub-type of the query's return type.
This is unsafe and should be used with caution.

Type Parameters:
A - Type of entities returned by the query.
B - Type of entities to downcast to.
Parameters:
query - Query who's results are put in the list.
Returns:
Returns a list that contains all objects fetched by the query.
Throws:
DataAccessException

queryTransformedResultsAsList

public static <P,T> List<T> queryTransformedResultsAsList(EntitiesQuery<P> query,
                                                          Transformation<P,T> adapter)
                                             throws DataAccessException
Fetches all results of an EntitiesQuery query to a list. Each result is first transformed based on a provided Transformation adapter.

Type Parameters:
P - Type of entities returned by the query.
T - Type of transformed object.
Parameters:
query - Query who's results are put in the list.
adapter - Adapter that transforms
Returns:
Returns a list that contains all transformed objects fetched by the query.
Throws:
DataAccessException

execute

public static void execute(String className,
                           Provider provider,
                           Object inputs)
                    throws LogicException,
                           DataException
Instantiates and executes an operation. This method does the following:
  • Instantiates the operation using Factory.
  • Copies all common properties from the specified input object to the operation.
  • Initializes the operation.
  • Opens the operation.
  • Executes the operation.
  • Closes the operation.

Parameters:
className - Name of operation class.
provider - Provider used to initialize the operation.
inputs - Object used to copy any input properties to the operation.
Throws:
LogicException
DataException

                         Provider provider,
                         Object inputs)

Instantiates and applies a Rule. This method does the following:
  • Instantiates the rule using Factory.
  • Copies all common properties from the specified input object to the rule.
  • Initializes the rule.
  • Opens the rule.
  • Executes the rule.
  • Closes the rule.

Parameters:

provider - Provider used to initialize the rule.
